page_content: The page provides information on building regulations in specific zones, including required documents and procedures.
The page discusses a government decision regarding parking guidelines, dated 30.03.2022.
The page offers various resources and information for primary schools, including organizational and educational guidelines.
The page details social security benefits for older unemployed individuals, including eligibility criteria and application procedures.
The page outlines guidelines on how changing time is considered as working time for employees, including legal bases and exceptions.
The page provides information on insurance and benefits for primary school teachers, including procedures for accidents and illnesses.
The page discusses a repealed directive from the Finance Department and the Administrative Commission of the Superior Court regarding property transfer tax.
